content: 6 k6 k2tog sm repeat to end of round 70 stitches round 7 k to end of round sm round 8 k5 k2tog sm repeat to end of round 60 stitches round 9 k to end of round sm round10 k4 k2tog sm repeat to end of round 50 stitches round 11 k to end of round sm round 12 k3 k2tog sm repeat to end of round 40 stitches round 13 k to end of round sm round 14 k2 k2tog sm repeat to end of round 30 stitches round 15 k to end of round sm round 16 k1 k2tog rm repeat to end of round 20 stitches round 17 k to end of round round 18 k2tog repeat to end of round 10 stitches round 19 k to end of round round 20 k2tog repeat to end of round 5 stitches finishing break yarn leaving an 8 tail with a tapestry needle thread through remaining 5 stitches and pull taut weave in ends block and enjoy * this cappellino has a lot of stretch so upon completion try it on to check the fit then wet block and dry over a balloon i typically inflate the balloon a little smaller than the desired circumference to allow the lace to open up to the perfect size 2 lace chart k 3 stitch bobble p 1 kfbf knit front back front turn 2 p3 turn ssk 3 k3 turn k2tog 4 p3 turn 5 k3 k1tbl 6 pass 2nd stitch over 1st repeat yo for an easy no-turn bobble https //cocoknits com/blogs/knit- mb tutorials/how-to-knit-bobbles- without-turning-your-work 3 chart instructions note purl 2 then knit the bracketed mid-section 6 times before knitting the final repeat of the round row 1 p x 2 k x 1 yo ssk k x 10 p x 2 x 6 k x 1 yo ssk k x 12 row 2 p x 2 yo k x 2 ssk k x 9 p x 2 x 6 yo k x 2 ssk k x 11 row 3 p x 2 k x 2 yo k x 1 ssk k x 8 p x 2 x 6 k x 2 yo k x 1 ssk k x 10 row 4 p x 2 k x 1 yo k x 3 ssk k x 7 p x 2 x 6 k x 1 yo k x 3 ssk k x 9 row 5 p x 2 k x 3 yo k x 2 ssk k x 6 p x 2 x 6 k x 3 yo k x 2 ssk k x 8 row 6 p x 2 k x 2 yo k x 4 ssk k x 5 p x 2 x 6 k x 2 yo k x 4 ssk k x 7 row 7 p x 2 k x 4 yo k x 3 ssk k x 4 p x 2 x 6 k x 4 yo k x 3 ssk k x 6 row
